korean: 카메라를 들고 동네를 걸으며 사진을 찍었다.
평소에 지나치던 풍경도 렌즈를 통해 보니 새롭게 보였어.
예쁜 건물과 나무를 찾아 셔터를 눌렀다.
english: I walked around the neighborhood with my camera taking pictures.
Scenes I usually passed by looked new when viewed through the lens.
I pressed the shutter looking for pretty buildings and trees.
It was also fun to organize the photos.
